analyzed: ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

original: bam po brgya dgu bcu pa //
analyzed: bam po brgya dgu bcu pa //
translated: PART 100

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

analyzed: gang de ltar rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, because it is utterly pure.”

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro; ;gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro; ;gsol pa /
translated: He said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags /
translated: why is the realization of that the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Because it is the knowledge of the aspects of the path.”🔽He said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽tshu rol gyi 'gram mam /🔽pha rol gyi 'gram mam /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / tshu rol gyi 'gram mam / pha rol gyi 'gram mam /
translated: if when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom🔽they do not stand on this side,🔽on the other side,

original: gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas na /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas na /
translated: or in the middle between the two,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab @252b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab @252b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, because of utter purity.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: why, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshu rol gyi 'gram mam /
analyzed: tshu rol gyi 'gram mam /
translated: do they not stand on this side,

original: pha rol gyi 'gram mam /
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'gram mam /
translated: on the other side,

original: gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: or in the middle, and are utterly pure?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, because the three times are the same.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin
translated: If sons or daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle, through lack of skill in means, form the notion of this perfection of wisdom as an object, they will be led to a heap of nothingness,

original: pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o //
analyzed: pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o //
translated: they will be led far away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord:

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
translated: So it is, Subhuti.

original: rab 'byor / legs so legs so //🔽rab 'byor / de ni ming du'ang chags pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / legs so legs so // rab 'byor / de ni ming du'ang chags pa yin /
translated: Well said, Subhuti.

original: mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no //
translated: Subhuti, it is attachment to a name, it is attachment to a sign.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med do /
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med do /
translated: Subhuti, all dharmas are signless,

original: ming med pa'o /
analyzed: ming med pa'o /
translated: nameless.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord:

original: ji ltar na ming du'ang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ming du'ang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags /
translated: How is it that they are attached to a name, attached to a sign?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du 'dzin tam mtshan @253a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du 'dzin tam mtshan @253a *//
translated: Subhūti, if sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle apprehend the perfection of wisdom as a name or apprehend it as a sign,

original: mar 'dzin na /
analyzed: mar 'dzin na /
translated: then

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing /
translated: they apprehend the perfection of wisdom as a name and a sign,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to //
translated: and because of attachment to the perfection of wisdom, they bring forth a perfection of wisdom that is empty.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo //
translated: They reject the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing /
translated: Subhūti, if sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle apprehend the perfection of wisdom as a sign,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na /
translated: and if, having apprehended the perfection of wisdom as a sign, they imagine it is the perfection of wisdom,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to //
translated: They imagine that through the perfection of wisdom,🔽they are attached to the perfection of wisdom, and so they make the perfection of wisdom into something that is accumulated.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo //
translated: They make the perfection of wisdom into something that is far away.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la /
translated: for the bodhisattva great beings,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la /
translated: this perfection of wisdom is well explained and well taught.

original: chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: It is amazing that you have also taught about their attachments and nonattachments.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin /
translated: what are the bodhisattva great beings’ attachments?

original: ma chags pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: ma chags pa ni gang yin /
translated: What are their nonattachments?”

original: rab @253b 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab @253b 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pa /
translated: herein, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, unskilled in means,

original: gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // 'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: if they perceive form as empty, that is attachment.🔽If they perceive feeling as empty, that is attachment.🔽If they perceive perception as empty, that is attachment.

original: 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive volitional factors as empty, that is attachment.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽mig stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // mig stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive consciousness as empty, that is attachment.🔽If they perceive the eyes as empty, that is attachment.

original: rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the ears as empty, that is attachment.🔽If they perceive the nose as empty, that is attachment.

original: lce stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: lce stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the tongue as empty, that is attachment.

original: lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the body as empty, they are attached.

original: yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽gzungs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // gzungs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the mind as empty, they are attached.🔽If they perceive the dhāraṇīs as empty, they are attached.

original: sgra stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: sgra stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive sounds as empty, they are attached.🔽If they perceive smells as empty, they are attached.

original: ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽reg stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // reg stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive tastes as empty, they are attached.🔽If they perceive touches as empty, they are attached.

original: chos stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

translated: If they perceive the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact as empty, they are attached.🔽If they perceive the earth element as empty, they are attached.

original: me'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: ma rig pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽med dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // med dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: skye mched dug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched dug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If one perceives craving as empty, one is attached.

analyzed: len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

translated: If one perceives the perfection of patience as empty,

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o // nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the perfection of wisdom as ‘empty’, they are attached.🔽If they perceive inner emptiness as ‘empty’, they are attached.

translated: If they perceive ultimate emptiness as ‘empty’, they are attached.🔽If they perceive conditioned emptiness as ‘empty’, they are attached.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive unconditioned emptiness as ‘empty’, they are attached.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

translated: If they perceive the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as a sign, they are attached.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as a sign, they are attached.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: @255b rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the knowledge of all aspects as empty, they are attached.🔽If they

analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive the knowledge of all aspects as empty, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas /🔽'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas / 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: Furthermore, Venerable Śāriputra, sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who are not skilled in means,🔽if they perceive past dharmas as past dharmas, they are attached.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive future dharmas as future dharmas, they are attached.

original: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive present phenomena as present phenomena, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas /
translated: Furthermore, if sons of noble family or daughters of noble family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, from the time when they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: practice the perfection of generosity without apprehending anything, they are attached.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the perfection of moral discipline, they are attached.🔽If they practice the perfection of patience, they are attached.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the perfection of perseverance, they are attached.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the perfection of concentration, they are attached.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the perfection of wisdom, they are attached.

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice inner emptiness, they are attached.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of the external, they are attached.🔽If they practice the emptiness of the internal and the external, they are attached.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of emptiness, they are attached.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la @257a *//
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la @257a *//
translated: If they practice the emptiness of great extent,

original: spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: they are attached.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of ultimate reality, they are attached.🔽If they practice the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, they are attached.🔽If they practice the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, they are attached.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of the unlimited, they are attached.🔽If they practice the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, they are attached.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of non-rejection, they are attached.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of inherent existence, they are attached.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of all phenomena, they are attached.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of specific characteristics, they are attached.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of non-apprehension, they are attached.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of non-entities, they are attached.🔽If they practice the emptiness of essential nature, they are attached.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, they are attached.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the applications of mindfulness, they are attached.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the right efforts, they are attached.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o // dbang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the legs of miraculous power, they are attached.🔽If they practice the faculties, they are attached.

original: stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the powers, they are attached.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the branches of awakening, they are attached.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the noble eightfold path, they are attached.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the noble truths, they are attached.

original: bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the meditative concentrations, they are attached.

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the immeasurables, they are attached.

original: gzugs med @257b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med @257b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the formless absorptions, they are attached.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of liberation, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the formless absorptions, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the base of neither-perception-nor-non-perception, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the applications of mindfulness, they are attached.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyod na chags pa'o // mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of the right efforts, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the legs of miraculous power, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the faculties, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the powers, they are attached.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of the branches of enlightenment, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the noble eightfold path, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the fruit of stream enterer, they are attached.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of the fruit of once-returner, they are attached.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of the fruit of non-returner, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the fruit of arhatship, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of individual enlightenment, they are attached.

original: byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the aspects of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the emptiness meditative stabilization, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the signless meditative stabilization, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the wishless meditative stabilization, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the sky, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the earth, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the ocean, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the vajra, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the mountain, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the lion, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the lion’s play, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the lion’s posture, they are attached.🔽If they practice the aspects of the meditative stabilization of the heroic march,

original: snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice great compassion, they are attached.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, they are attached.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the result of stream enterer, they are attached.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the result of once-returner, they are attached.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o // dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the result of non-returner, they are attached.🔽If they practice the state of a worthy one, they are attached.

original: rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, they are attached.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice knowledge of path aspects, they are attached.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the knowledge of all aspects, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du /
translated: you asked,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med @258a *//🔽pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med @258a *//🔽pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘What is the nonattachment of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: here bodhisattva mahāsattvas skilled in the perfection of wisdom do not have the notion of form as form.

original: tshor ba la tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of feeling as feeling.

original: 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do; ;'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of perception as perception. They do not have the notion of formation as formation.

original: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of consciousness as consciousness.🔽They do not have the notion of past phenomena as past phenomena.🔽They do not have the notion of future phenomena as future phenomena.

original: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of present phenomena as present phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Venerable Śāradvatīputra

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no //🔽'di la sbyin pa zhig byin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no // 'di la sbyin pa zhig byin no //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva skilled in means who practices the perfection of wisdom🔽does not think, “I will give a gift🔽to this one,

original: sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe'am /🔽bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe'am / bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo //
translated: I will give such and such a gift.”🔽“I will guard morality.”

original: tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe'am /
translated: “I will guard such and such morality.”

original: bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo //
translated: “I will cultivate patience.”

original: bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
translated: “I will cultivate such and such patience.”

original: bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsom mo //
translated: “I will undertake perseverance.”

original: brtson 'grus 'di lta bu @258b zhig brtsam mo zhe'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus 'di lta bu @258b zhig brtsam mo zhe'am /
translated: “I will undertake such and such perseverance.”

original: bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag go /
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag go /
translated: “I will enter into concentration.”

original: bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par bzhag go zhe'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par bzhag go zhe'am /
translated: “I will enter into such and such concentration.”

original: bdag gis ni shes rab gcig bsgom mo; ;shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis ni shes rab gcig bsgom mo; ;shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
translated: I am cultivating this kind of wisdom.

original: bdag gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do //🔽bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do // bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do //
translated: I am producing merit.🔽I am producing this kind of merit.

original: bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do //
analyzed: bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do //
translated: I am producing this much merit.

original: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o //
translated: I am entering into the faultlessness of a bodhisattva.

original: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I am purifying a buddhafield.

original: bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: I am bringing beings to maturity.

original: bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med do //
analyzed: bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med do //
translated: I am attaining the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad /
translated: bodhisattva great beings who are skilled in means and practice the perfection of wisdom do not have any of those thoughts.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos @259a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos @259a *//
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities,

original: po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste /
analyzed: po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go /
analyzed: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go /
translated: These are the bodhisattva great beings who are skilled in means and practice the perfection of wisdom without attachment.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to venerable Subhūti:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: rnam grangs gang gis na /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rnam grangs gang gis na / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: by what method

original: rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: do the sons of the lineage or daughters of the lineage in the Bodhisattva Vehicle🔽become attached?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this had been said, venerable Subhūti said to Śakra, Lord of the Gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /
translated: Here, sons and daughters of noble family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who perceive the mind, who perceive the perfection of generosity,🔽who perceive the perfection of ethical discipline,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /
translated: who perceive the perfection of patience, who perceive the perfection of diligence, who perceive the perfection of meditative concentration, who perceive the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid @259b stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid @259b stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
translated: who perceive inner emptiness, who perceive outer emptiness, who perceive inner and outer emptiness, who perceive the emptiness of emptiness, who perceive great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
translated: the perception of the emptiness of ultimate reality, the perception of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the perception of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the perception of the emptiness of what transcends limits, the perception of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽the perception of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the perception of the emptiness of inherent natures, the perception of the emptiness of all phenomena, the perception of the emptiness of defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
translated: the perception of the emptiness of non-apprehension, the perception of the emptiness of non-entities, the perception of the emptiness of essential nature, and the perception of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
translated: perceiving the applications of mindfulness, perceiving the right efforts, perceiving the legs of miraculous power, perceiving the faculties, perceiving the powers,🔽perceiving the branches of awakening, perceiving the noble eightfold path, perceiving the noble truths, perceiving the meditative stabilizations, perceiving the immeasurable thoughts,🔽perceiving the formless absorptions,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad med pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa @260a *//

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te /
translated: they have the notion that they are the Blessed Buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: and having the notion that they are the wholesome roots that are generated in the Buddha, they gather up those wholesome roots, and having gathered them up, they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni /
translated: And they have the notion that they are the dedication.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste /
translated: those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle are attached.

original: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na /
analyzed: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na /
translated: Having become attached to those attachments,

original: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par @260b mi nus so //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par @260b mi nus so //
translated: they are not able to practice the perfection of wisdom without attachment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni / koo shi ka /🔽gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: de ni / koo shi ka / gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: Kauśika,🔽the nature of form cannot be dedicated.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of feeling cannot be dedicated.

original: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of perception cannot be dedicated,

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of formation cannot be dedicated,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of consciousness cannot be dedicated.

original: mig gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mig gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the eyes cannot be dedicated,

original: rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the ears cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of the nose cannot be dedicated,

original: lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the tongue cannot be dedicated,

original: lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the body cannot be dedicated,

original: yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the mind cannot be dedicated.🔽The nature of sights cannot be dedicated,

original: sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of sounds cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of smells cannot be dedicated,

original: re'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: re'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of tastes cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of touchables cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of mental phenomena cannot be dedicated.

original: reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of contact cannot be dedicated,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of mental phenomena cannot be dedicated,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of eye consciousness cannot be dedicated,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of ear consciousness cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of nose consciousness cannot be dedicated,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs @261a *//
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs @261a *//
translated: the nature of tongue consciousness cannot be dedicated,

original: su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of body consciousness cannot be dedicated,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of mind consciousness cannot be dedicated,🔽the nature of eye contact cannot be dedicated,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of ear contact cannot be dedicated,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the union of nose and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the union of tongue and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the union of body and contact cannot be dedicated.🔽The nature of the union of mind and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sensation that arises from the condition of the union of eye and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sensation that arises from the condition of the union of ear and contact cannot be dedicated.🔽The nature of the sensation that arises from the condition of the union of nose and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sensation that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and contact cannot be dedicated.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact that involves the body is not something that can be appropriated.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact that involves the mind is not something that can be appropriated.

original: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the earth element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the water element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar @261b mi nus so //🔽rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar @261b mi nus so // rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the fire element is not something that can be appropriated.🔽The nature of the wind element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the space element is not something that can be appropriated.🔽The nature of the consciousness element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of ignorance is not something that can be appropriated.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of volitional factors is not something that can be appropriated.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of consciousness cannot be appropriated,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of name-and-form cannot be appropriated,

original: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the six sense spheres cannot be appropriated,

original: reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of contact cannot be appropriated,

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of feeling cannot be appropriated,

original: sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of craving cannot be appropriated,

original: len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of appropriation cannot be appropriated,🔽the nature of existence cannot be appropriated,

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of birth cannot be appropriated,

original: rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: and the nature of old age and death cannot be appropriated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the perfection of generosity cannot be appropriated,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the perfection of morality is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the perfection of patience is not something that can be dedicated,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the perfection of perseverance is not something that can be dedicated,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the perfection of concentration is not something that can be dedicated,

original: shes rab @262a *//🔽kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab @262a *// kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not something that can be dedicated,🔽inner emptiness is not something that can be dedicated,🔽outer emptiness is not something that can be dedicated,🔽inner and outer emptiness is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness that is a non-entity is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of all things is not something that can be dedicated,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-observation is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-rejection is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of all things is not something that can be dedicated,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of an existent is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of a nonexistent is not something that can be dedicated,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of something that is not existent is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of something that is not nonexistent is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of something that is not existent is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of the non-apprehension of something that is not nonexistent is not something that can be dedicated,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is not

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the great cannot be dedicated.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the ultimate cannot be dedicated.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the conditioned cannot be dedicated.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned cannot be dedicated.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes cannot be dedicated. The nature of the emptiness of what is without beginning and end cannot be dedicated.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded cannot be dedicated.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of inherent existence cannot be dedicated.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of all phenomena cannot be dedicated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of defining characteristics cannot be appropriated.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi @262b nus so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi @262b nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of nonobservation cannot be appropriated.🔽The nature of the emptiness of nonthings cannot be appropriated.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of essential nature cannot be appropriated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings cannot be appropriated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the applications of mindfulness cannot be appropriated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the right efforts cannot be appropriated.🔽The nature of the legs of miraculous power cannot be appropriated.

original: dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the faculties cannot be appropriated.

original: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the powers cannot be dedicated,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the aspects of enlightenment cannot be dedicated,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the noble eightfold path cannot be dedicated,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the noble truths cannot be dedicated,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the concentrations cannot be dedicated,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the immeasurables cannot be dedicated,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the formless absorptions cannot be dedicated,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the eight deliverances cannot be dedicated,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of the nine serial absorptions cannot be dedicated,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽mngon par shes @263a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // mngon par shes @263a *//
translated: The nature of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation cannot be dedicated.

original: pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the superknowledges cannot be dedicated.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the meditative stabilizations cannot be dedicated.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the dhāraṇī gateways cannot be dedicated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the powers of the tathāgatas cannot be dedicated.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the fearlessnesses cannot be dedicated.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the detailed and thorough knowledges cannot be dedicated.🔽The nature of great love cannot be dedicated.

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of great compassion cannot be dedicated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the result of stream enterer;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the result of non-returner;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: they cannot dedicate the nature of the knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: and they cannot dedicate the nature of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @263b pos gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam /🔽yang dag par bskul lam /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @263b pos gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam / yang dag par bskul lam /
translated: or encourages them,

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam /
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam /
translated: or generates enthusiasm for it,

original: yang dag par dga' bar bya na; yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar bya na; yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: or delights in it, they should teach others with a mind that has fully engaged with it.

original: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //🔽yang dag par spong bskyed pa bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o // yang dag par spong bskyed pa bya'o //
translated: They should encourage others.🔽They should generate enthusiasm for it.

original: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should delight in it.

original: de'ang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de'ang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, when they practice the perfection of giving,

original: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
