analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they should not conceptualize, ‘I am practicing the perfection of giving.’ When they practice the perfection of morality,

original: bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the perfection of moral discipline, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the perfection of moral discipline.”🔽When practicing the perfection of patience, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the perfection of patience.”🔽When practicing the perfection of diligence, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the perfection of diligence.”

original: bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the perfection of concentration, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the perfection of concentration.”

original: bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the perfection of wisdom, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog @264a *//🔽par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog @264a *// par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing the perfection of wisdom”;🔽when practicing inner emptiness, they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing inner emptiness”;

original: bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when practicing outer emptiness, they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing outer emptiness”;🔽when practicing inner and outer emptiness, they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing inner and outer emptiness”;

original: bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when practicing the emptiness of emptiness, they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing the emptiness of emptiness”;

original: bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when practicing great emptiness, they should not entertain the idea that “I am practicing great emptiness”;

original: bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of the great,🔽When practicing the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do //
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of the conditioned,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the conditioned,🔽When practicing the emptiness of the unconditioned,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the unconditioned,

original: bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / thog @264b ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / thog @264b ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of nature,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the emptiness of nature.

original: bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the emptiness of all phenomena.”🔽When practicing the emptiness of defining characteristics,🔽they do not think, “I am practicing the emptiness of defining characteristics.”

original: bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of nonobservation,🔽they do not think, “I am practicing the emptiness of nonobservation.”🔽When practicing the emptiness of nonthings,

original: bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the emptiness of nonthings.”🔽When practicing the emptiness of essential nature,

original: bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the emptiness of essential nature.”

original: bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,

original: bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur @265a *//
analyzed: bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur @265a *//
translated: they do not conceive of themselves as practicing the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the applications of mindfulness,

original: bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not conceive of themselves as practicing the applications of mindfulness.🔽When practicing the correct exertions,🔽they do not conceive of themselves as practicing the correct exertions.

original: bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the legs of miraculous power,

original: bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the bases of supernatural powers.🔽When practicing the faculties,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the faculties.

original: bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the powers,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the powers.

original: bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the branches of awakening,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the branches of awakening.

original: bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the noble eightfold path,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the noble eightfold path.

original: bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the noble truths,

original: bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i @265b tshe; bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i @265b tshe; bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: When practicing the meditative concentrations, they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the meditative concentrations.”

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the immeasurables,🔽they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the immeasurables.”

original: bdag ni tshad med pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni tshad med pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the formless absorptions,🔽they should not entertain the thought “I am practicing the formless absorptions.”

original: bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the eight aspects of liberation,

original: bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.”🔽When practicing the three gateways to liberation—emptiness, absence of characteristics, and absence of expectancy—

original: bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the three gateways to liberation.”🔽When practicing the superknowledges,

original: bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par @266a *//🔽rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par @266a *// rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the superknowledges.🔽When practicing the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the powers of the thus-gone ones,

original: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing the powers of the thus-gone ones.🔽When practicing fearlessness,🔽they should not entertain the idea that they are practicing fearlessness.

original: bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the correct understandings,

original: bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the correct and discerning awarenesses, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the correct and discerning awarenesses.🔽 When practicing great loving kindness, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing great loving kindness.

original: bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing great compassion, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing great compassion.🔽 When practicing the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the result of stream enterer, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of stream enterer.🔽 When practicing the result of once-returner, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of once-returner.🔽 When practicing the result of non-returner, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of non-returner.🔽 When practicing the result of arhat, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of arhat.🔽 When practicing the result of pratyekabuddha, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of pratyekabuddha.🔽 When practicing the result of buddha, they should not entertain the thought I am practicing the result of buddha.

original: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / @266b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / @266b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the result of stream enterer.”🔽When practicing the result of once-returner,

original: bdag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the result of once-returner.”🔽When practicing the result of non-returner,

original: bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: they do not think, “I am practicing the result of non-returner.”🔽When practicing the state of a worthy one,🔽they do not think, “I am practicing the state of a worthy one.”

original: bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing individual enlightenment,

original: bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the knowledge of path aspects,🔽they should not entertain the thought, ‘I am practicing the knowledge of path aspects.’

original: bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the knowledge of all aspects,🔽they should not entertain the thought, ‘I am practicing the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o //🔽yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o // yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
translated: They should be taught,🔽they should be inspired,

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: they should be encouraged,

original: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste /
translated: and they should be delighted.

original: de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: When those sons of enlightened heritage or

original: rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: daughters of enlightened heritage practice in that way, they should teach others unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
translated: and should encourage them.

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should make them enthusiastic.

original: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //🔽@267a *// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o // @267a *// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang /
translated: They should make them rejoice.🔽And when they teach that, encourage that, make others enthusiastic about that, and make others rejoice in that,

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe /
translated: when they teach that, encourage that, make others enthusiastic about that, and make others rejoice in that,

original: rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te /
analyzed: rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te /
translated: they will not be wounded, and they will encourage others with an encouragement that is approved by the Buddha.

original: de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: In that way, that son of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no ////
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no ////
translated: or that daughter of a good family will have given up all the extremes of attachment.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya go gcig pa /
analyzed: bam po brgya go gcig pa /
translated: PART 111

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so; ;zhes bya ba gnang ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so; ;zhes bya ba gnang ste /
translated: Then the Lord approved of Subhūti, saying,🔽“Excellent, Subhūti!

original: rab 'byor / de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so //
translated: In this way you have shown the bodhisattva great beings the kinds of attachments.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par bya'i /
translated: Subhūti, therefore I will teach you the kinds of attachments that are even more subtle than those.

original: de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Listen well and keep it in mind, I will teach it.”

original: de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas /
analyzed: de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas /
translated: “Very well, Lord,”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to //
translated: the venerable Subhūti replied to the Lord.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Lord said to him,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi @267b bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi @267b bu'am /
translated: “Subhūti, here a son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa /
translated: a daughter of a good family who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na /
translated: “Subhūti, if the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas were to be mentally attended to as having attributes,

original: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o //
translated: then, Subhūti, to the extent that they are attended to as having attributes, to that extent there is attachment.

original: gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge
analyzed: gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge
translated: “Moreover, if all the wholesome roots of those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas of the past, future, and present, who are free from all attachment, from the first production of the thought of awakening up to the establishment of the sacred Dharma,

original: ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /
analyzed: ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /
translated: were to be mentally attended to as having attributes,

original: yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
translated: and after being mentally attended to were to be dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
translated: then, Subhūti, to the extent that they are attended to as having attributes, to that extent there is attachment.

original: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
analyzed: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
translated: making them into signs.

original: na / rab 'byor /
analyzed: na / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,🔽to that extent there is attachment,

original: ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
analyzed: ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
translated: to that extent there is a sign.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Those tathāgatas are not to be attended to as signs.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Those tathāgatas’ wholesome roots are not to be attended to as signs.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab @268a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / shes rab @268a *//
translated: Śāriputra then said to Subhūti, “Subhūti, you have been told by the Lord that you are the foremost of those who dwell in peace.🔽Subhūti, you should teach this perfection of wisdom to the bodhisattva great beings.🔽Subhūti, you should instruct them, you should give them a detailed explanation of it, you should make them take it up, you should make them remember it, you should make them recite it, you should analyze it for them, and you should make them understand it.”

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Subhūti then said to Śāriputra, “Śāriputra, the perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord has said, ‘Subhūti, all phenomena are naturally void.’🔽Śāriputra, the perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the perfection of wisdom!

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the perfection of wisdom is unproduced

original: mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste /
translated: and unconditioned.

original: de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be fully awakened to by anyone.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One, all phenomena are not fully awakened to.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the nature of phenomena is not dual but singular.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no //🔽gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no // gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the singular nature of phenomena is not a nature.🔽What is not a nature is unproduced.

original: gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o //
translated: What is unproduced is unconditioned.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig por rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas par shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig por rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas par shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no //
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being, who knows the single nature of dharmas as not a nature, as unmade, and as uncompounded, has completely abandoned all forms of attachment.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is difficult to understand.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @268b stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @268b stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong /🔽ma thos / ma rtogs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong / ma thos / ma rtogs /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because no one has seen the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par ma shes /
analyzed: rnam par ma shes /
translated: heard it, cognized it,

original: mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or fully awakened to it.🔽”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is inconceivable.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the mind does not know it.

original: gzugs kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyis ma shes so //
translated: Form does not know it.

original: tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by feeling.

original: 'du shes kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by perception.

original: 'du byed kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by consciousness.🔽It is not known by the eyes.

original: mig gis ma shes so; ;rna bas ma shes so //🔽snas ma shes so //
analyzed: mig gis ma shes so; ;rna bas ma shes so // snas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the ears.🔽It is not known by the nose.

original: lces ma shes so //
analyzed: lces ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the tongue.

original: lus kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: lus kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the body.

original: yid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: yid kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the thinking mind.

original: gzugs kyis ma shes so //🔽sgras ma shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyis ma shes so // sgras ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by form.🔽It is not known by sound.

original: dris ma shes so; ;ros ma shes so //
analyzed: dris ma shes so; ;ros ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by smell.

original: reg gis ma shes so //🔽chos kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: reg gis ma shes so // chos kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by taste.🔽It is not known by feeling.🔽It is not known by mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so // sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by ear consciousness.🔽It is not known by nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by thinking-mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by eye contact.🔽It is not known by ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the union of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pas @269a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so // yid kyi 'dus te reg pas @269a *//
translated: It is not known through the union of the body.

original: ma shes so //
analyzed: ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the union of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the ear.🔽It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the condition of contact through the union of the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the water element.

original: me'i khams kyis ma shes so //🔽rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: me'i khams kyis ma shes so // rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the fire element.🔽It is not known through the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the space element.🔽It is not known through the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pas ma shes so //
analyzed: ma rig pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by name and form.

original: skye mched drug gis ma shes so //
analyzed: skye mched drug gis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the six sense sources.

original: reg pas ma shes so //
analyzed: reg pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by contact.

original: tshor bas ma shas so //
analyzed: tshor bas ma shas so //
translated: It is not known by feeling.

original: sred pas ma shes so //
analyzed: sred pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by craving.

original: len pas ma shes so //🔽srid pas ma shes so //
analyzed: len pas ma shes so // srid pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by appropriation.🔽It is not known by existence.

original: skye bas ma shes so //
analyzed: skye bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by birth.

original: rga shis ma shes so //
analyzed: rga shis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfection of ethical discipline.🔽It is not known by the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so //🔽@269b nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so // @269b nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so // phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfection of wisdom.🔽It is not known by inner emptiness.🔽It is not known by outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so // chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not known.🔽The emptiness of the great is not known.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is not known.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is not known.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not known.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of beyond extremes is not known.🔽The emptiness of no beginning or end is not known.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is not known.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not known.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not known.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic characteristics is not known.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension is not known.🔽The emptiness of nonthings is not known.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: The emptiness of essence is not known.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the emptiness of essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so //🔽dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so // dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not understand through the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the immeasurables.

original: @270a *// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: @270a *// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so //
translated: They do not understand through the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma shes so //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: the clairvoyances;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: the meditative stabilities;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so //🔽byams pa chen pos ma shes so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so // byams pa chen pos ma shes so //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽great love;

original: snying rje chen pos ma shes so //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos ma shes so //
translated: great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.🔽It is not known through the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: phyar mi 'ong ba'o 'bras bus ma shes so //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shas so //
analyzed: phyar mi 'ong ba'o 'bras bus ma shes so // dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shas so //
translated: It is not known through the fruit of arhatship.

original: rang byang chub kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known through individual enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /🔽le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las / le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
translated: It is not known by the knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽It is not known by the knowledge of all aspects.🔽🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽Chapter Twenty-Seven🔽

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /🔽bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma @270b mchis pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma @270b mchis pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not known by the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is not known by the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sna mi dmigs pa dang / lce mi dmigs pa dang / lus mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / sgra mi dmigs pa dang / dri mi dmigs pa dang / ro mi dmigs pa dang / reg mi dmigs pa dang /🔽chos mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sna mi dmigs pa dang / lce mi dmigs pa dang / lus mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / sgra mi dmigs pa dang / dri mi dmigs pa dang / ro mi dmigs pa dang / reg mi dmigs pa dang / chos mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the nose is non-apprehensible, the tongue is non-apprehensible, the body is non-apprehensible, the thinking mind is non-apprehensible, sights are non-apprehensible, sounds are non-apprehensible, smells are non-apprehensible, tastes are non-apprehensible, and touchables are non-apprehensible,🔽and dharmas are non-apprehensible, eye consciousness is non-apprehensible, ear consciousness is non-apprehensible, nose consciousness is non-apprehensible, tongue consciousness is non-apprehensible, body consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: and thinking-mind consciousness is non-apprehensible, eye contact is non-apprehensible, ear contact is non-apprehensible, nose contact is non-apprehensible, tongue contact is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa @271a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa @271a *//
translated: It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the eye.🔽It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the ear.🔽It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the nose.🔽It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the tongue.🔽It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the body.

original: dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is the non-apprehension of the sensation that arises from the union of the mind.

original: sa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the earth element is non-apprehensible, the water element is non-apprehensible, the fire element is non-apprehensible, the wind element is non-apprehensible, the space element is non-apprehensible, the consciousness element is non-apprehensible, ignorance is non-apprehensible,

original: 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: formations are non-apprehensible, consciousness is non-apprehensible, name and form are non-apprehensible, the six sense fields are non-apprehensible, contact is non-apprehensible, feeling is non-apprehensible, craving is non-apprehensible,

original: len pa mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang //
analyzed: len pa mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang //
translated: grasping is non-apprehensible, becoming is non-apprehensible, birth is non-apprehensible, and old age and death are non-apprehensible. The perfection of giving is non-apprehensible, the perfection of morality is non-apprehensible,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the perfection of patience, which is non-apprehensible, the perfection of perseverance, which is non-apprehensible, the perfection of concentration, which is non-apprehensible, and the perfection of wisdom, which is non-apprehensible.

original: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi @271b stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi @271b stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: inner emptiness, which is non-apprehensible, outer emptiness, which is non-apprehensible, inner and outer emptiness, which is non-apprehensible, the emptiness of emptiness, which is non-apprehensible, great emptiness, which is non-apprehensible,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality, which is non-apprehensible, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, which is non-apprehensible, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, which is non-apprehensible, the emptiness of the unlimited, which is non-apprehensible, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, which is non-apprehensible,🔽and the emptiness of non-dispersal, which is non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection is nonapprehended, the emptiness of nature is nonapprehended, the emptiness of all phenomena is nonapprehended, the emptiness of its own mark is nonapprehended, the emptiness of nonapprehension is nonapprehended,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonthings is nonapprehended, the emptiness of essence is nonapprehended, the emptiness of the essence of nonthings is nonapprehended, the applications of mindfulness are nonapprehended,

original: yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po mi dmigs pa dang / stobs mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po mi dmigs pa dang / stobs mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the right efforts are nonapprehended, the legs of miraculous power are nonapprehended, the faculties are nonapprehended, the powers are nonapprehended, the branches of enlightenment are nonapprehended, the noble eightfold path is nonapprehended,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar @272a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar @272a *//
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible, the immeasurable aspirations are non-apprehensible, the formless absorptions are non-apprehensible,

original: pa brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: pa brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the eight deliverances are non-apprehensible, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are non-apprehensible, the clairvoyances are non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the meditative stabilizations are non-apprehensible, the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible, the powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible, the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible, the detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible, great loving kindness is non-apprehensible,

original: snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgya skyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgya skyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is to not apprehend the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas. It is to not apprehend the result of stream enterer. It is to not apprehend the result of once-returner. It is to not apprehend the result of non-returner. It is to not apprehend the state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the great compassion is non-apprehensible, and because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible, and because the fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible, and because the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is non-apprehensible, and because the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is non-apprehensible, and because the fruit of arhatship is non-apprehensible, and because individual enlightenment is non-apprehensible, and because the knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible, and because the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: how should bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom practice?”🔽The Lord said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @272b chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @272b chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: if they do not practice with regard to form, they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not practice with regard to form as permanent or

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: impermanent, they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not practice with regard to form as blissful or

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod @280b na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am /

analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is pure, or that it is impure, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is empty, or that it is not empty, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is with signs, or that it is signless, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is having aspirations, or that it is without aspirations, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is calm, or that it is not calm, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is void, or that it is not void, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is afflicted, or that it is purified, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is generated, or that it is extinguished, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is deficient, or that it is complete, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am /🔽bdag gam bdag med pa'am /
analyzed: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am / bdag gam bdag med pa'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is wholesome, or that it is unwholesome, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is defiled, or that it is undefiled, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is mundane, or that it is supramundane, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is conditioned, or that it is unconditioned, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion that the body is with outflows, or that it is without outflows, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do //
analyzed: sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do //
translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the body is with attachment, or that it is without attachment, then one engages in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not engage with the notion

original: gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: If they do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness as permanent or impermanent, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness as blissful or suffering, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am /🔽bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do; ;gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am /

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If they do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness as originating or not originating, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag @281a *//
analyzed: gang rtag pa'am mi rtag @281a *//
translated: If they do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness as entities or non-entities, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one does not engage with the idea that feelings that arise from the sensory contact of the eye are a self🔽or not a self, one engages in the perfection of wisdom.
